name: patient_id
description: Unique patient identifier

name: procedure_deep_brain_stimulation_VIM
description: Unilateral or bilateral thalamic ventralis intermedius nucleus (VIM) deep brain stimulation (DBS) procedure for essential tremor or Parkinsonian tremor.

name: procedure_deep_brain_stimulation_STN_GPi
description: Unilateral or bilateral subthalamic nucleus (STN) or globus pallidus interna (GPi) deep brain stimulation (DBS) procedure for Parkinson's disease.

name: diagnosis_essential_tremor
description: Diagnosis of Essential Tremor (ET).

name: diagnosis_parkinsonian_tremor
description: Diagnosis of Parkinsonian tremor.

name: diagnosis_parkinsons_disease
description: Diagnosis of Parkinson's Disease (PD).

name: dbs_device_fda_approved
description: Deep Brain Stimulation (DBS) device is Food and Drug Administration (FDA) approved.

name: dbs_device_category_b_ide_clinical_trial
description: Deep Brain Stimulation (DBS) device used in accordance with FDA approved protocols governing Category B Investigational Device Exemption (IDE) DBS clinical trials.

name: diagnosis_et_postural_kinetic_tremors
description: Diagnosis of Essential Tremor (ET) based on postural or kinetic tremors of hand(s) without other neurologic signs.

name: diagnosis_idiopathic_pd_tremor_dominant
description: Diagnosis of idiopathic Parkinson's Disease (PD) with presence of at least 2 cardinal PD features (tremor, rigidity or bradykinesia) and of a tremor-dominant form.

name: pd_cardinal_feature_tremor
description: Presence of tremor as a cardinal Parkinson's Disease feature.

name: pd_cardinal_feature_rigidity
description: Presence of rigidity as a cardinal Parkinson's Disease feature.

name: pd_cardinal_feature_bradykinesia
description: Presence of bradykinesia as a cardinal Parkinson's Disease feature.

name: tremor_severity_fahn_tolosa_marin_met
description: Marked disabling tremor meets criteria of at least level 3 or 4 on the Fahn-Tolosa-Marin Clinical Tremor Rating Scale (or equivalent scale) in the extremity intended for treatment.

name: tremor_impairing_daily_activities
description: Tremor causing significant limitation in daily activities.

name: optimal_medical_therapy_failure_tremor
description: Disabling tremor persists despite optimal medical therapy.

name: patient_cooperation_ability
description: Patient's willingness and ability to cooperate during conscious operative procedure, post-surgical evaluations, and adjustments of medications and stimulator settings.

name: diagnosis_pd_at_least_2_cardinal_features
description: Diagnosis of Parkinson's Disease (PD) based on the presence of at least 2 cardinal PD features (tremor, rigidity or bradykinesia).

name: diagnosis_advanced_idiopathic_pd
description: Advanced idiopathic Parkinson's Disease (PD) as determined by Hoehn and Yahr stage or Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale (UPDRS) part III motor subscale.

name: l_dopa_responsive
description: Patient is L-dopa responsive with clearly defined 'on' periods.

name: persistent_disabling_pd_symptoms
description: Persistent disabling Parkinson's symptoms (e.g., dyskinesias, motor fluctuations, or disabling 'off' periods) despite optimal medical therapy.

name: optimal_medical_therapy_failure_pd
description: Persistent disabling Parkinson's symptoms or drug side effects despite optimal medical therapy.

name: exclusion_non_idiopathic_pd
description: Exclusion criterion: Non-idiopathic Parkinson's disease or 'Parkinson's Plus' syndromes.

name: exclusion_cognitive_impairment
description: Exclusion criterion: Cognitive impairment that would be worsened by or interfere with DBS benefit.

name: exclusion_dementia
description: Exclusion criterion: Dementia that would be worsened by or interfere with DBS benefit.

name: exclusion_depression
description: Exclusion criterion: Depression that would be worsened by or interfere with DBS benefit.

name: exclusion_current_psychosis
description: Exclusion criterion: Current psychosis.

name: exclusion_alcohol_abuse
description: Exclusion criterion: Alcohol abuse.

name: exclusion_drug_abuse
description: Exclusion criterion: Other drug abuse.

name: exclusion_structural_lesions
description: Exclusion criterion: Structural lesions (e.g., basal ganglionic stroke, tumor, vascular malformation) as etiology of the movement disorder.

name: exclusion_previous_movement_disorder_surgery
description: Exclusion criterion: Previous movement disorder surgery within the affected basal ganglion.

name: exclusion_significant_comorbidities
description: Exclusion criterion: Significant medical, surgical, neurologic, or orthopedic co-morbidities contraindicating DBS surgery or stimulation.

name: dbs_contraindication_diathermy
description: Contraindication for patients with DBS implantation: exposure to diathermy (shortwave, microwave, ultrasound deep heat treatment).

name: dbs_contraindication_mri
description: Contraindication for patients with DBS implantation: exposure to any type of MRI.

name: dbs_caution_cardiac_pacemakers
description: DBS procedure should be performed with extreme caution in patients with cardiac pacemakers.

name: dbs_caution_electronic_implants
description: DBS procedure should be performed with extreme caution in patients with other electronically controlled implants.

name: neurosurgeon_trained_in_dbs
description: Neurosurgeon must be properly trained in the Deep Brain Stimulation (DBS) procedure.

name: neurosurgeon_experience_movement_disorder_surgery
description: Neurosurgeon must have experience with the surgical management of movement disorders, including DBS therapy.

name: neurosurgeon_experience_stereotactic_neurosurgery
description: Neurosurgeon must have experience performing stereotactic neurosurgical procedures.

name: operative_team_dbs_training_experience
description: Operative teams must have training and experience with DBS systems, including knowledge of anatomical and neurophysiological characteristics for localizing the targeted nucleus, surgical/implantation techniques, and device operational/functional characteristics.

name: movement_disorder_physician_involvement
description: Physicians specializing in movement disorders must be involved in patient selection and post-procedure care for DBS.

name: facility_brain_imaging_equipment
description: Hospital medical centers must have brain imaging equipment (MRI and/or CT) for pre-operative stereotactic localization and targeting of surgical sites.

name: facility_stereotactic_surgery_or_equipment
description: Hospital medical centers must have operating rooms with all necessary equipment for stereotactic surgery.

name: facility_support_services
description: Hospital medical centers must have support services necessary for patient care during and after DBS procedure, including potential complications.
